Actions.Text: REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING
REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING

Title: Makes changes in the disposition of revenue from lottery prize account
Summary: Makes changes in the percentages for disposition of revenue from lottery prize account to increase the percentage, by five percent, directed to state aid for education funding.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to the disposition of revenue from the lottery prize account
